resources.string:
Subcore is a daemon that systematically monitors various data input from your system to optimize your device for a unique workload. The goal is to conserve power that would rather be wasted on basic tasks (which require much less power than they are provided). This algorithm provides outstanding battery life at little cost. The device will feel smooth as usual. 

Subcore optimizes multiple aspects of the system, including: 
- sysctl (kernel) tweaks 
- block (storage) tweaks 
- mm (memory) tweaks 
- CPU tweaks 
- GPU tweaks 
- scheduler tweaks 
- and much more 

Thank you for using Subcore and supporting me and my hobby. Contact me for criticism, compliments, concerns, or anything else!
